entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 5:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
